sourcesContent: import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-add-task", templateUrl: "./add-task.component.html", styleUrls: ["./add-task.component.css"], }) export class AddTaskComponent { text!: string; day!: string; reminder: boolean = false; onSubmit() { if (!this.text) { alert("Please add a task!"); return; } } }
